enjug.erijan.games.util

Interface GenericSubject

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DiceHandler, GameState, ScoreInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GameStateImpl, ScoreSheet, YatzyDice

    public interface GenericSubject
    GenericSubject to be paired with the generic GenericObserver interface in this package. The methods setChanged and clearChanged have empty default implementations provided since they are somethimes not needed. Created by Jan Eriksson on 2/12/15.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void clearChanged()
      Optional, used to clear a changed state.
      void notifyObservers()
      Notify all registered observers by calling their update method.
      void registerObserver(GenericObserver observer)
      Register as obsrever at the Subject.
      void removeObserver(GenericObserver observer)
      Remove observer from subject.
      default void setChanged()
      Optional observer feature, only notify observers when changed set.

    • Method Detail

      • registerObserver

        void registerObserver(GenericObserver observer)
        Register as obsrever at the Subject.
        Parameters:
        observer - The observer to be registered.

      • removeObserver

        void removeObserver(GenericObserver observer)
        Remove observer from subject.
        Parameters:
        observer - The observer to be removed.

      • notifyObservers

        void notifyObservers()
        Notify all registered observers by calling their update method.

      • setChanged

        default void setChanged()
        Optional observer feature, only notify observers when changed set.

      • clearChanged

        Optional, used to clear a changed state.
